import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import api from './services/api' import './global.css' import './App.css' import './Sidebar.css' import './Main.css' // import Header from './Header' function App() { const [devs, setDevs] = useState([]) const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState('') const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState('') const [github_username, setGithubUsername] = useState('') const [techs, setTechs] = useState('') useEffect(() => { //roda apenas quando carrega a pagina, porque [] estÃ¡ vazio navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { const { latitude, longitude } = position.coords setLatitude(latitude) setLongitude(longitude) }, (err) => { console.log(err); }, { timeout: 30000 } ) }, []) useEffect(() => { async function loadDevs() { const response = await api.get('/devs') setDevs(response.data) } }, []) async function handleAddDev(e) { e.preventDefault() const response = await api.post('/devs', { github_username, techs, latitude, longitude }) setGithubUsername('') setTechs('') setLatitude('') setLongitude('') console.log(response.data) } return (
